author: yuyiguo
body:
This PA include:
1. DBS client update: \* user configurable  ssl_verifypeer when creating DBS client object.
                                   \* support long list of block for block summary API.
2. Add new EventsPerDay script for Dataops.
3. Bug fix for DBS3 server when auto generate sql with input as a list.
title: DBS_3_2_4a
